mapper.select: SELECT mps.stats_id, mps.kills, mps.deaths, mps.assists, mps.gold_earned, mps.damage_dealt, mps.damage_taken, mps.vision_score, mps.match_id, mps.player_id, mps.hero_id, p.game_name, h.hero_name FROM match_player_stats mps LEFT JOIN player p ON mps.player_id = p.player_id LEFT JOIN hero h ON mps.hero_id = h.hero_id WHERE mps.match_id = #{matchId} ORDER BY mps.player_id
SELECT stats_id, kills, deaths, assists, gold_earned, damage_dealt, damage_taken, vision_score, match_id, player_id, hero_id FROM match_player_stats WHERE stats_id = #{statsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match_player_stats ( stats_id, kills, deaths, assists, gold_earned, damage_dealt, damage_taken, vision_score, match_id, player_id, hero_id ) VALUES ( #{statsId}, #{kills}, #{deaths}, #{assists}, #{goldEarned}, #{damageDealt}, #{damageTaken}, #{visionScore}, #{matchId}, #{playerId}, #{heroId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE match_player_stats SET kills = #{kills}, deaths = #{deaths}, assists = #{assists}, gold_earned = #{goldEarned}, damage_dealt = #{damageDealt}, damage_taken = #{damageTaken}, vision_score = #{visionScore}, match_id = #{matchId}, player_id = #{playerId}, hero_id = #{heroId} WHERE stats_id = #{statsId}
